text: can i assign a class to a dnd_column or dnd_module?

Hi there, I’m receiving crawl errors on Google Search Console for what appears to be a query to my blog’s related posts module. The URL looks like this <http://www.website.com/_hcms/related-blog-posts?blogPostId=5927204129&blogId=5661868051&targetBlogIds=5661868051&targetBlogPostIds=5927204129&macro=blog_post_formatter&limit=6&|www.website.com/_hcms/related-blog-posts?blogPostId=5927204129&blogId=5661868051&targetBlogIds=5661868051&targetBlogPostIds=5927204129&macro=blog_post_formatter&limit=6&>…
Any idea why GSC is picking these kinds of pages up?
